com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.api.userstore.group

Interface GroupsService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupsServiceImpl

    public interface GroupsService
    Service for controlling the groups in a user store.

    • Method Summary

        List<Group> list(ResourceIdentifier userStore)
          throws HodErrorException
        List the groups in the given user store, using a token proxy from a TokenProxyService.
        Parameters:
        userStore - The resource name for the user store
        Returns:
        The groups in the user store and their relationships
        Throws:
        HodErrorException

        Parameters:

        userStore - The resource name for the user store
        Returns:

        HodErrorException

      • create

        CreateGroupResponse create(ResourceIdentifier userStore,
                           String name)
                    throws HodErrorException
        Create a group in the given user store, using a token proxy from a TokenProxyService. The group will be created without any hierarchical relationships.
        Parameters:
        userStore - The resource name for the user store
        name - The group name
        Returns:
        Details about the resulting action
        Throws:
        HodErrorException

      • create

        CreateGroupResponse create(TokenProxy<?,TokenType.Simple> tokenProxy,
                           ResourceIdentifier userStore,
                           String name)
                    throws HodErrorException
        Create a group in the given user store. The group will be created without any hierarchical relationships.
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use for authentication
        userStore - The resource name for the user store
        name - The new group name
        Returns:
        Details about the resulting action
        Throws:
        HodErrorException

      • createWithHierarchy

        CreateGroupResponse createWithHierarchy(ResourceIdentifier userStore,
                                        String name,
                                        List<String> parents,
                                        List<String> children)
                                 throws HodErrorException
        Create a group in the given user store using a token proxy from a TokenProxyService. Parent and child relationships will be set up between the new group and the groups listed in the parents and children parameters.
        Parameters:
        userStore - The resource name for the user store
        name - The new group name
        parents - A list of names of groups which should be parents of the new group (can be null or empty)
        children - A list of names of groups which should be children of the new group (can be null or empty)
        Returns:
        Details about the resulting action
        Throws:
        HodErrorException

      • createWithHierarchy

        CreateGroupResponse createWithHierarchy(TokenProxy<?,TokenType.Simple> tokenProxy,
                                        ResourceIdentifier userStore,
                                        String name,
                                        List<String> parents,
                                        List<String> children)
                                 throws HodErrorException
        Create a group in the given user store. Parent and child relationships will be set up between the new group and the groups listed in the parents and children parameters.
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use for authentication
        userStore - The resource name for the user store
        name - The new group name
        parents - A list of names of groups which should be parents of the new group (can be null or empty)
        children - A list of names of groups which should be children of the new group (can be null or empty)
        Returns:
        Details about the resulting action
        Throws:
        HodErrorException
